data.title: Phoenix-Mesa Gateway Airport
data.text:
NOTICE: We are currently in a peak travel season and parking lots fill up quickly. Please allow an extra 20 minutes to find parking and ensure you arrive at the ticket counter two hours prior to scheduled departure.

Parking Information and Feedback

For up-to-date parking status notifications, text GATPRK to 888-777 (you can opt-out of the messages at anytime). For parking questions or feedback, please call the Parking Hotline at . View a map of the parking lots here.

Cell Phone Lot

The cell phone lot is located at 5250 South Sossaman Road, just south of Ray Road on the west side of Sossaman. No unattended vehicles are allowed.

Hourly Parking Lot

Rate: $1 / half-hour

Hourly parking is located in the Hourly Parking Lot just west of the Charles L. Williams Terminal. Enter the lot at Texas Ave and keep right. Southbound traffic will enter by turning left from Sossaman Rd.

Daily Lot

Rate: $1 / half-hour up to $13 / day maximum

Overnight parking is available in the Daily Lot just south of the Charles L. Williams Terminal.

Economy Lot

Rate: $1 / half-hour up to $9 / day

Additional overnight parking is available in the Economy Lot located at 7255 East Ray Road, just east of Sossaman Road. This lot offers easily accessible handicap spaces next to each of the five shaded shuttle stops. Each shuttle stop is equipped with an automated pay station for cash and credit card payments. A comfortable shuttle van will transport customers to the Charles L. Williams Terminal beginning two hours prior to departures. We recommend passengers plan an additional 15 - 20 minutes for shuttle transportation.

Covered Parking - Economy Lot

Rate: $1 / half-hour up to $11 / day

Keep your car cool with premium covered parking! Located within the Economy Lot, drivers will take a parking ticket at the Economy Lot entrance then scan the barcode on the ticket at the entrance to the covered parking. Once scanned, the entry gate will open and you can enter the covered parking area. When ready to exit, there are two options. Pay with cash or credit card at the automated pay station at the covered parking shuttle stop and insert your pair ticket at the Economy Lot exit or pay with credit card at the Economy Lot exit.

Handicap Overnight Parking - Daily and Economy Lots

Handicap overnight parking is available in the Daily and Economy Lots. If parked in the Economy Lot, handicap spaces are located next to the shuttle stops; the shuttle will drop-off / pick-up at the terminal curbside. Shuttle service is only available in the Economy Lot.

Shuttle Service

Free shuttle service is available in the Economy Lot. The Economy Lot shuttle begins at least two-and-a-half hours prior to the first departure of the day and continues service one-and-a-half hours after the last checked baggage is delivered in baggage claim for the last flight of the day.

Pay for Parking

Credit Cards and Branded Debit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, etc.)

Pay for parking at the exit of each lot or at a paystation. Paystations can be found in the terminal and in the Economy Lot at Bus Stops 2, 3, and 4.

How to pay at the lot exit:

Insert ticket

Follow prompts on the screen

Insert card or use contactless payment

Click button if you want a receipt

How to pay at a paystation:

Insert ticket

Follow prompts on the screen

Insert card or use contactless payment

Click button if you want a receipt

Retrieve paid / validated ticket and proceed to exit. You have a 30-minute grace period to exit once ticket is paid.

Cash

Cash payments are accepted at paystations in the terminal and at the Economy Lot Bus Stops 1 and 5.

How to pay cash at a paystation:

Insert ticket

Follow prompts on the screen

Click button if you want a receipt

Insert cash into the slot

Retrieve paid / validated ticket and proceed to exit. You have a 30-minute grace period to exit once ticket is paid.

Mobile Device

Once you're ready to exit the parking lot, scan the QR code on your ticket with your mobile device then pay using a credit or debit card. Scan the barcode on your ticket at the exit pay machine and it will register as being paid. Please note charges are accrued each half-hour, so it is recommended you pay once you are at your vehicle and ready to exit the lot to avoid accruing additional charges.
